title: Types Of Covid-19 Treatment
content:
If you think you could have COVID-19 and are at higher risk for severe illness, talk to your healthcare provider about testing and/or treatment right away, even if your symptoms are mild. If you donâ€™t have a healthcare provider, contact your local pharmacy, community health center or health department.
Don't Delay
Treatment must be started within 5-7 days of when your symptoms first start.
